sentences.english: My neighbor giggled in embarrassment, looking at the table like I did.
sentences.chinese: 我的鄰座侷促不安地傻笑着，跟我一樣盯着桌子看。

sentences.english: The little boy squirmed with shame.
sentences.chinese: 這個小男孩因羞愧而侷促不安。

sentences.english: I sometimes cringe when I see these kinds of articles.
sentences.chinese: 看到這類文章的時候我經常感到侷促。

sentences.english: In restless dreams I walked along.
sentences.chinese: 在侷促不安的夢中我獨自行走。

sentences.english: The cooldown time for Binding Word has been changed from 5minutes to 45 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 束厄侷促之咒語的冷卻時間由5分改爲45秒。

sentences.english: The boy stared at the floor embarrassedly.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩侷促不安地盯着地板。

sentences.english: When the child see all the room fille with stranger he is much abash.
sentences.chinese: 那小孩一看到滿屋子都是陌生人，感到非常侷促不安。

sentences.english: His words let me feel abashed .
sentences.chinese: 他的話讓我覺得侷促不安。

sentences.english: Langdon hesitated, feeling uncertain as the stranger's sallow eyes studied him.
sentences.chinese: 那陌生人灰黃的眼睛打量着蘭登，使他感到侷促不安。

sentences.english: Mr. Wang's face turned scarlet, and the guests all stared uncomfortably at their bowls and chopsticks.
sentences.chinese: 汪先生的臉開始發紅，客人都侷促地注視各自的碗筷。

sentences.english: Questioned persistently by the teacher, he squirmed .
sentences.chinese: 在老師不斷地盤問下，他有些侷促不安。

sentences.english: This will do nothing to further conversation and only make the person uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 這對推進談話沒任何用，僅僅使這個人侷促不安。

sentences.english: The boy felt constraint in her presence.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩在她面前感到侷促不安。

sentences.english: Does a room full of strangers at party intimidate you?
sentences.chinese: 在一個滿是陌生人的聚會里你會感到侷促不安嗎？

sentences.english: He fidgeted awkwardly with his feet.
sentences.chinese: 他侷促不安地挪動雙腳。

definition: lit. minor magician in the presence of a great one (idiom)/fig. to pale into insignificance by comparison
increasingly/more and more/ever more/all the more
all black, no daylight (idiom); a world without justice
to look up and see no-one familiar (idiom); not having anyone to rely on/without a friend in the world
